comments: Haliburton (IND) establishes his right foot as his pivot foot, which he maintains after his gather.
Grant (POR) is in the paint for longer than three seconds without imminently actively guarding an opponent.
Brogdon (POR) contests Nesmith's (IND) jump shot and the contact after the release, and follow-through, is marginal.
Nesmith (IND) is moving alongside Grant's (POR) path and marginal contact occurs as he defends the driving shot attempt.
Nesmith (IND) brings his hand toward the ball and Thybulle (POR) spins away from the marginal contact following the change in possession.
Nembhard (IND) and Thybulle (POR) come together at the same spot and marginal contact occurs as they move down the court in transition.
Brogdon (POR) and Turner (IND) briefly engage and disengage during rebounding.
Brown (IND) steps into Brogdon's (POR) space and initiates body contact that affects his SQBR.
Turner (IND) firms up in Thybulle's (POR) path and does not deliver contact during the screen.
Grant (POR) jumps to Haliburton's (IND) side and avoids making contact with Haliburton during the shot attempt.
Ayton (POR) firms up over his right leg and marginal contact occurs with Nesmith (IND) as he navigates around the screen.
Turner (IND) cleanly steals the ball away from Ayton (POR).
Brogdon (POR) and Nesmith (IND) engage and disengage during the inbound and the contact is marginal.
Brown (IND) makes contact with Brogdon's (POR) wrist, which causes him to lose control of the ball.
Nesmith (IND) is in the air when the ball becomes loose and he does not intentionally kick the ball.
Brogdon (POR) and Nesmith (IND) come together at the same spot, and marginal contact occurs as they pursue the loose ball.
The timeout called by Portland is recognized before the potential foul on Hield (IND) is whistled.
Grant (POR) firms up over his right leg and marginal contact occurs as Brown (IND) goes over the screen.
Brogdon (POR) is bracing for the contact from Brown (IND) and marginal contact occurs as Brogdon releases away from the contact.
Camara (POR) and Turner (IND) engage and disengage during the inbound and the contact is marginal.
Hield (IND) and Camara (POR) come together during the inbound and marginal contact occurs as Hield releases away from the defender.

Camara (POR) establishes a legal guarding position in front of Hield (IND) and raises his arm to a vertical position as he absorbs the contact with Hield, who is stepping toward the basket during his upward shooting motion.

call_type: Turnover: Lost Ball Out of Bounds
comments: Hield (IND) is the last player to touch the ball before it goes out of bounds.  Possession is correctly awarded to Portland.
